plot: When her son Jonathon dies of AIDS, a mother seeks out a young gay man in her neighborhood in order to gain a degree of understanding and acceptance.
title: Strain of You
plot_es: When her son Jonathon dies of AIDS, a mother seeks out a young gay man in her neighborhood in order to gain a degree of understanding and acceptance.
plot_en: When her son Jonathon dies of AIDS, a mother seeks out a young gay man in her neighborhood in order to gain a degree of understanding and acceptance.
